title: The Sun Drifts Through Cloudy Skies

text_block_list.text:
The tryout race is in full swing. Nakayama Festa is 
among the Umamusume participants.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Aahh… I'm so nervous…! I'll finish first 
today… hmm… or at least in the top five.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Hey, kid! You came to the tryouts too! Got an eye 
on one of the girls already or something?

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Oh… Oh? Hmm? Nakayama Festa? 
That name rings a bell, but, uhhh….
choice_data_list:
I'm sure that even someone as experienced as you will be 
impressed when you see her run!

text_block_list.text:
Just the other day, I saw her first-rate physical abilities and 
courage with my very own eyes. I'm sure that she can use her 
intuition and skills in this tryout race too.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Huff… huff… ….tch…!

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
…Hm? Hey, it doesn't look like the girl you mentioned 
is aiming for the front spot at all…

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Look at that, her legs seem like they're fine, 
but little by little she's slowing down.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
In the end, Nakayama winds up in 13th 
place. It was a truly mediocre race.
Haah… haaah… ugh…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Awww… I guess it didn't work after all. 
I'll just have to try harder next time!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: "After all"? "Next time"? Do I get the same sort of leeway too?
…Festa, you don't have to worry.

Whatever you want, you will find it at Tracen Academy. 
You'll even be able to meet someone who can help you 
fulfill your deepest desires.
I'm sure you'll be able to "live" there.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: …Ahh… If only…

Nakayama Festa had lost her energy, as if how she acted the 
other day had been an illusion. If someone told me she was a 
completely different person, I would've believed them.
choice_data_list: (Because if she ran properly, she would…)

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text: …Quit it, kid.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I remember now, "Nakayama Festa". That girl isn't the sort of 
Umamusume you can handle.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
She's famous among trainers. No matter how much 
instruction they give her, she does whatever she wants. 
Just the other day, she got into some trouble before the 
tryout race and was suspended.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Just now, did she look like she was serious? Were you thinking 
"if she ran properly, she would…"

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
…I think she's lost her motivation. You have a future, kid. Both of 
you are better off staying out of each other's business. It's better 
than struggling and hurting each other just to break up in the end.

Hearing the advice from my senior puts me at a loss for words. 
Having watched many Umamusume, his opinion is probably quite 
reasonable, but still…

As she left the course, she looked 
as if she was crying out for help.

Wondering if she was as my senior had said she was, I found 
myself scouring through her records.

There's a very big difference between her good times and bad 
times… overall, it's honestly not good. …But all they have in 
their documents are the time figures.

Why was her expression after the tryout race so bitter? 
Why didn't she look like she was giving it her all?

…I closed the record. There probably wasn't 
any information I needed to know right now.
choice_data_list: I need to learn more about her.

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Leader
text_block_list.text:
Stop coming here every day! If you wanna learn 
more 'bout Nakayama, ask her yourself!
choice_data_list: But she's been absent for the last week…

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Leader
text_block_list.text:
And how the hell should I know why? 
Screw off! Adults are the worst!

I dust off my dirty clothes. Unfortunately, I still haven't been 
able to learn anything new about Nakayama Festa.
choice_data_list: (I'll take any new information at this point…)

text_block_list.text:
You the trainer who's been going around 
asking about Nakayama lately? You're the 
talk of the school and the back alleyways.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Sirius Symboli. And? My name can't be the 
only thing you wanted to know, right?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Now, be a good dog and follow me. If 
you do, I'll give you what you want.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
This is a freestyle race track. A lawless place 
where anyone who wants to run can run.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
It's a haven for unusual sorts who find that harsher turf suits 
their tastes. They say that Nakayama used it as her playground.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Were you listening? "Used it". She isn't running anymore. 
That's just the way it is now.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
So this is where you were. How's the nightlife? I thought the 
only fun you had was during a good game.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
I'm ready to enter a tryout race. So I'm washing 
my hands of that sort of thing. That's all.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
From now on, I can bet my life on racing. The most intoxicating, 
extreme gamble I could only take by putting my body on the line. 
…No need for anything else.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Or something like that… I guess. 
Still, I thought she was a pretty funny gal.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
…Listen. She has a fatal flaw. I'm sure her "teacher" at the 
hospital knows more about it.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
One of my admirers is a former classmate of Nakayama's. 
They were the one who gave me the info.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
I've written down the Teacher's contact info and location. 
The rest is up to you.

Sirius Symboli offered me a piece of paper. 
I took it, thanked her, and she walked away 
with a click of her tongue.
choice_data_list: <size=34>A secret that her teacher at the hospital knows…</size>

text_block_list.text:
Does that mean she taught Nakayama Festa? Was she sick? 
I anxiously came up with possibilities in my head before ——

I arrived to see the "Teacher" lying 
on a bed and wearing a hospital gown.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Just during elementary school. I was Festa's 
homeroom teacher when she was in the 5th grade. 
She was quite the handful.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
There are so many stories to tell and so many things to say… 
but before I do, could you please watch a video?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Yes! Before I get to the story, I first wanted to show you the 
best side of that girl! This video was taken two years ago.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama's Former Teacher
text_block_list.text: This is the first time she picked a fight with the "world".
